actions.name: affinity-up
leadsTo: greet ticket taker
ingratiate ticket taker
bribe ticket taker
threaten ticket taker
ignore ticket taker
give ticket
receive mark
lie to ticket taker
greet stranger
ask stranger for a favor
ask stranger a question
greet acquaintance
lie to acquaintance
ask acquaintance for a favor
ask acquaintance for a distraction
offer acquaintance a refreshment
berate acquaintance
ask acquaintance for information
thank acquaintance

actions.name: greet ticket taker
leadsTo: polite greeting to ticket taker
flirty greeting to ticket taker
ask a question: "is this bienfait's theatre?"
say nothing to ticket taker initially (male)
say nothing to ticket taker initially (female)

actions.name: ingratiate ticket taker
leadsTo: ingratiate with excessive politeness
offer flattery and compliments (male)
offer flattery and compliments (female)
be honest: admit you don't have a ticket and ask to be let in as a favor

actions.name: bribe ticket taker
leadsTo: offer a little money
offer a lot of money (noble)
offer a lot of money (servant)

actions.name: threaten ticket taker
leadsTo: threaten to have the ticket taker fired if she doesn't let you in
state that you are friends with the theatre owner, who will be upset to hear that you have not been allowed in (noble)
state that you are friends with the theatre owner, who will be upset to hear that you have not been allowed in (servant)
threaten to make a scene and interrupt the performance

actions.name: ignore ticket taker
leadsTo: try to sneak past
simply ignore her and walk by
simply ignore her and walk by (servant)
push her out of the way

actions.name: give ticket
leadsTo: Give ticket and smile but say nothing
Give ticket and smile and offer a compliment
Give ticket and do not smile

actions.name: receive mark
leadsTo: Receive mark and say thank you
Receive mark and ask what is showing today
Receive mark and ask if x is here today
Receive mark and ask if the theatre owner is here today
Receive mark and say nothing upon receiving mark

actions.name: lie to ticket taker
leadsTo: lie and say that your servant has your ticket inside the theatre
lie and say that your master has your ticket inside the theatre
lie and say that you're a guest of the owner (noble)
lie and say that you're a guest of the owner (servant)
lie and say that you're an artist invited to work here next week (male noble)
lie and say that you're an artist invited to work here next week (female noble)
lie and say that you're an artist invited to work here next week (servant)

actions.name: greet stranger
leadsTo: hello old friend! (male noble)
hello old friend! (female noble)
hello old friend! (servant)
Hello esteemed person I've never met before! (noble)
Hello esteemed person I've never met before! (servant)
Hello, have we met before?
Hello, I love this play, I've seen it four times! (female noble)
Hello, I love this play, I've seen it four times! (males)

actions.name: ask stranger for a favor
leadsTo: Ask for a favor: Can you help me get backstage? *servantVersion*
Ask for a favor: Can you help me get backstage? *femaleNobleVersion*
Ask for a favor: Can you help me get backstage? *maleNobleVersion*
Ask for a favor: Could you hold this package?
Ask for a favor: What do you say we whistle and stomp? *femaleNobleYesStomp*
Ask for a favor: What do you say we whistle and stomp? *femaleNobleNoStomp*

actions.name: ask stranger a question
leadsTo: Ask a question: Have you been to this theatre before?
Ask a question: How many people do you think are backstage
Ask a question: Are there are a lot of nobles here *servantVersion*
Ask a question: Are there are a lot of nobles here *maleNobleVersion*
Ask a question: Are there are a lot of nobles here *femaleNobleVersion*
Ask a question: Have you ever participated in a claque? *servantVersion*
Ask a question: Have you ever participated in a claque? *femaleNobleVersion*
Ask a question: Have you ever participated in a claque? *maleNobleVersion*
Ask a question: Do you understand what's going on in this play *servantVersion*

actions.name: greet acquaintance
leadsTo: Hello old friend! (male noble)
Hello old friend! (female noble)
Hello old friend! (servant)
I recognize you from Versailles! (male noble)
I recognize you from the Salon of Mme. X! (female noble)
I recognize you from the gargote in my neighborhood! (servant)
I know you, keep your distance from me! (male noble)
I know you, keep your distance from me! (female noble)
I know you, keep your distance from me! (servant)

actions.name: lie to acquaintance
leadsTo: You remember the last time, right? Want to help me make some trouble again? (male noble)
You remember the last time, right? Want to help me make some trouble again? (female noble)
You remember the last time, right? Want to help me make some trouble again? (servant)
My word, it's been ages since I've seen you. (male)
My word, it's been ages since I've seen you. (female)

actions.name: ask acquaintance for a favor
leadsTo: Can I ask you for a favor?
Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed male noble)
Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed male noble)
Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed female noble)
Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed female noble)
Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed servant)
Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed servant)
Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (allied male noble)
Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (unallied male noble)
Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (allied and esteemed female noble)
Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (unallied and unesteemed female noble)
Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied male noble)
Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied male noble)
Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied female noble)
Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied female noble)
Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied servant)
Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied servant)
Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied and esteemed servant)

actions.name: ask acquaintance for a distraction
leadsTo: Can I ask you for help?
Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (esteemed male noble)
Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (unesteemed male noble)
Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (female noble)
Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (esteemed servant)
Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (unesteemed servant)
Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (esteemed male noble)
Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (unesteemed male noble)
Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (female noble)
Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (esteemed servant)
Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (unesteemed servant)

actions.name: offer acquaintance a refreshment
leadsTo: Here, let me buy you an orange. Don't ask me any more questions. You know very well I can't answer them! (allied male noble)
Please, let me buy you a refreshment, and urge you to respect the pudeur of a noblewoman in need, and not oblige me to recount the humiliation... (allied female noble)

Here, let me buy you an orange. To be honest, it' my master's urgent business so I can't talk about it other than that it's, of course, an affair of the heart and that my very life depends on my getting backstage! (allied servant)

Here, let me buy you an orange. To be honest, it' my master's urgent business so I can't talk about it other than that it's, of course, an affair of the heart and that my very life depends on my getting backstage! (unallied servant)

actions.name: berate acquaintance
leadsTo: Do as I say at once!
You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say!
You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say! (male noble)

actions.name: ask acquaintance for information
leadsTo: Can I ask you for information?
Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied male noble to noble)
Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied female noble to noble)
Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied servant to noble)
Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied male noble to noble)
Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied female noble to noble)
Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied servant to noble)

actions.name: thank acquaintance
leadsTo: My hearty thanks, I won't forget your help! Now watch out, I'm headed backstage! (male noble)
Thank you, you've been such a great help. Now please, I must get backstage, it's urgent! (female noble)
Thank you, and please trust that in helping me, you are truly helping my master - your generosity will not be forgotten! (servant to noble)
I can't thank you enough - count on me for whatever you need, anytime! (servant to servant)

actions.name: polite greeting to ticket taker
actions.displayName: polite greeting to ticket taker

performance.text: The ticket taker appreciates your courtesy.

actions.name: flirty greeting to ticket taker
actions.displayName: flirty greeting to ticket taker

performance.text: The ticket taker is intrigued by your forwardness.

actions.name: ask a question: "is this bienfait's theatre?"
actions.displayName: ask a question: "is this bienfait's theatre?"

performance.text: "Yes, it is" she responds, curious that a patron would concern themselves over the owner.

actions.name: say nothing to ticket taker initially (male)
actions.displayName: say nothing to ticket taker initially (male)

performance.text: The ticket taker regards your coldness unkindly.

actions.name: say nothing to ticket taker initially (female)
actions.displayName: say nothing to ticket taker initially (female)

performance.text: The ticket taker regards your coldness unkindly and scowls back -- you have made a powerful enemy this day!

actions.name: Give ticket and smile but say nothing
actions.displayName: Give ticket and smile but say nothing

performance.text: The ticket taker smiles back.

actions.name: Give ticket and smile and offer a compliment
actions.displayName: Give ticket and smile and offer a compliment

performance.text: The ticket taker blushes.

actions.name: Give ticket and do not smile
actions.displayName: Give ticket and do not smile

performance.text: The ticket taker responds with a frown of her own.

actions.name: Receive mark and say thank you
actions.displayName: Receive mark and say thank you

performance.text: The ticket taker nods her head and gestures to enter the theatre.

actions.name: Receive mark and ask what is showing today
actions.displayName: Receive mark and ask what is showing today

performance.text: The ticket taker looks at you quizzicaly. "You purchased a ticket but did not know the show? How curious!"

actions.name: Receive mark and ask if x is here today
actions.displayName: Receive mark and ask if x is here today

performance.text: The ticket taker looks at you quizzically.

actions.name: Receive mark and ask if the theatre owner is here today
actions.displayName: Receive mark and ask if the theatre owner is here today

performance.text: The ticket taker looks at you quizzically.

actions.name: Receive mark and say nothing upon receiving mark
actions.displayName: Receive mark and say nothing upon receiving mark

performance.text: The ticket taker frowns at the rude gesture.

actions.name: My word, it's been ages since I've seen you. (male)

actions.name: My word, it's been ages since I've seen you. (female)
actions.displayName: My word, it's been ages since I've seen you. (female)

actions.name: Can I ask you for a favor?
actions.displayName: Can I ask you for a favor?

performance.text: Sure, what do you seek?

actions.name: Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed male noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed male noble)

performance.text: Sure, but what do you want in the smelly backstage of this little theatre?

actions.name: Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed male noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed male noble)

performance.text: I'm sure you're joking!

actions.name: Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed female noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed female noble)

performance.text: Madame, I can't imagine what you would need backstage!

actions.name: Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed female noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed female noble)

performance.text: Perhaps you're mistaking me for someone else, I would never help a lady in that way!

actions.name: Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed servant)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed servant)

performance.text: I suppose I could, but what's back there anyway?

actions.name: Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed servant)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed servant)

performance.text: Can't you just watch the show like everyone else?

actions.name: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (allied male noble)
actions.displayName: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (allied male noble)

performance.text: If you insist, but this is very shady.

actions.name: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (unallied male noble)
actions.displayName: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (unallied male noble)

performance.text: I'll do nothing of the sort, but I won't denounce you for whatever you're up to.

actions.name: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (allied and esteemed female noble)
actions.displayName: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (allied and esteemed female noble)

performance.text: Madame! I have no idea what's gotten into you!

actions.name: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (unallied and unesteemed female noble)
actions.displayName: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (unallied and unesteemed female noble)

performance.text: Madame! I have no idea what's gotten into you!

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied female noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied female noble)

performance.text: Certainly, let me help.

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied female noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied female noble)

performance.text: I can help, but I can't imagine why you would want to get any closer!

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied female noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied female noble)

performance.text: Here, let me help you.

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied male noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied male noble)

performance.text: Follow me!

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied male noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied male noble)

performance.text: Come now, I'm watching the show!

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied servant)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied servant)

performance.text: Sure, let's see how close we can get!

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied servant)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied servant)

performance.text: I'm really in no moode to push through this crowd right now.

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied and esteemed servant)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied and esteemed servant)

performance.text: I can certainly help, but couldn't you get there just as well yourself?

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied and esteemed servant)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied and esteemed servant)

performance.text: Do you know to whom you are speaking? Go away, and leave me in peace!

actions.name: Can I ask you for help?
actions.displayName: Can I ask you for help?

performance.text: Sure, what do you seek?

actions.name: Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (esteemed male noble)
actions.displayName: Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (esteemed male noble)

performance.text: Sure, I'll help you!

actions.name: Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (unesteemed male noble)
actions.displayName: Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (unesteemed male noble)

performance.text: Are you drunk? Away, away from me!

actions.name: Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (female noble)
actions.displayName: Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (female noble)

performance.text: I will do nothing of the sort, and neither will you!

performance.text: Are you drunk? Away, away from me!

performance.text: OK!

actions.name: Please, let me buy you a refreshment, and urge you to respect the pudeur of a noblewoman in need, and not oblige me to recount the humiliation... (allied female noble)
actions.displayName: Please, let me buy you a refreshment, and urge you to respect the pudeur of a noblewoman in need, and not oblige me to recount the humiliation... (allied female noble)

performance.text: OK!

actions.name: Here, let me buy you an orange. To be honest, it' my master's urgent business so I can't talk about it other than that it's, of course, an affair of the heart and that my very life depends on my getting backstage! (allied servant)
actions.displayName: Here, let me buy you an orange. To be honest, it' my master's urgent business so I can't talk about it other than that it's, of course, an affair of the heart and that my very life depends on my getting backstage! (allied servant)

performance.text: OK!

actions.name: Here, let me buy you an orange. To be honest, it' my master's urgent business so I can't talk about it other than that it's, of course, an affair of the heart and that my very life depends on my getting backstage! (unallied servant)
actions.displayName: Here, let me buy you an orange. To be honest, it' my master's urgent business so I can't talk about it other than that it's, of course, an affair of the heart and that my very life depends on my getting backstage! (unallied servant)

performance.text: Don't think you can buy me off with an orange.

actions.name: Do as I say at once!
actions.displayName: Do as I say at once!

performance.text: Excuse me?

actions.name: You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say!
actions.displayName: You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say!

performance.text: I most certainly will not! Begone, you knave!

actions.name: You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say! (male noble)
actions.displayName: You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say! (male noble)

performance.text: My goodness sir! You are quite rude, but I shall do as you command...

actions.name: My hearty thanks, I won't forget your help! Now watch out, I'm headed backstage! (male noble)
actions.displayName: My hearty thanks, I won't forget your help! Now watch out, I'm headed backstage! (male noble)

performance.text: OK!

actions.name: Thank you, you've been such a great help. Now please, I must get backstage, it's urgent! (female noble)
actions.displayName: Thank you, you've been such a great help. Now please, I must get backstage, it's urgent! (female noble)

performance.text: OK!

actions.name: Thank you, and please trust that in helping me, you are truly helping my master - your generosity will not be forgotten! (servant to noble)
actions.displayName: Thank you, and please trust that in helping me, you are truly helping my master - your generosity will not be forgotten! (servant to noble)

performance.text: OK!

actions.name: I can't thank you enough - count on me for whatever you need, anytime! (servant to servant)
actions.displayName: I can't thank you enough - count on me for whatever you need, anytime! (servant to servant)

performance.text: OK!

actions.name: Can I ask you for information?
actions.displayName: Can I ask you for information?

performance.text: Sure, what do you seek?

actions.name: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied male noble to noble)
actions.displayName: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied male noble to noble)

performance.text: No, but I am sure that whoever it is, he could not be hard for gentleman such as yourself to find.

actions.name: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied female noble to noble)
actions.displayName: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied female noble to noble)

performance.text: I do not, but what could you possibly need with him?

actions.name: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied servant to noble)
actions.displayName: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied servant to noble)

performance.text: No, I don't have the privilege. Are you considering a career as a puppeteer?

actions.name: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied male noble to noble)
actions.displayName: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied male noble to noble)

performance.text: No, but I am unsurprised that you should be looking for such a person!

actions.name: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied female noble to noble)
actions.displayName: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied female noble to noble)

performance.text: I am rather shocked that you should have any interest in such a person!

actions.name: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied servant to noble)
actions.displayName: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied servant to noble)

performance.text: Please spare me your impertinent questions!
